summary: A structured container for the results of a causal (autoregressive) language model, encapsulating the loss, token prediction scores, and optional intermediate tensors such as hidden layer activations, self‑attention maps, cross‑attention maps, and cached key/value pairs for fast sequential decoding.
business_intent: Enable applications that generate or evaluate text by providing all necessary model outputs and caching information in a single object, simplifying integration with generation pipelines, performance monitoring, and debugging tools.
